1{-# LANGUAGE ViewPatterns #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Token for sieve pattern. 
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Subtext.Sieve.Token
7  ( SivToken (..),
8    SivBracket (..),
9    SivKey (..),
10    sivTokens,
11  ) where
12
13import qualified Data.Char                    as Ch
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture     as O
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base         as B
16
17-- | Sieve token.
18data SivToken t
19    = SivText  t
20    | SivKey   SivKey
21    | SivOpen  SivBracket
22    | SivClose SivBracket
23      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
24
25instance B.GetCodePos (SivToken t) where
26    getCP  _ = B.def
27    getCPs _ = []
28
29-- | Sieve bracket.
30data SivBracket
31    = SivGroup
32    | SivRepeat Int
33    | SivOption
34      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
35
36sivBracket :: String -> Maybe (SivToken t)
37sivBracket "("   = Just $ SivOpen    SivGroup
38sivBracket ")"   = Just $ SivClose   SivGroup
39sivBracket "{"   = Just $ SivOpen  $ SivRepeat 0
40sivBracket "}"   = Just $ SivClose $ SivRepeat 0
41sivBracket "{-"  = Just $ SivOpen  $ SivRepeat 1
42sivBracket "-}"  = Just $ SivClose $ SivRepeat 1
43sivBracket "["   = Just $ SivOpen    SivOption
44sivBracket "]"   = Just $ SivClose   SivOption
45sivBracket _     = Nothing
46
47tBracket :: (O.Textual t) => t -> Maybe (SivToken t, t)
48tBracket t = bracket2 t O.<||> bracket1 t where
49    bracket2 (O.tCut2 -> O.Jp2 a b t') = pair t' <$> sivBracket [a,b]
50    bracket2 _ = Nothing
51
52    bracket1 (O.tCut -> O.Jp a t') = pair t' <$> sivBracket [a]
53    bracket1 _ = Nothing
54
55    pair t' b = (b, t')
56
57-- | Sieve keyword.
58data SivKey
59    = SivAnyChar   -- ^ __[ _ ]__ Any single character.
60    | SivAnyText   -- ^ __[ * ]__ Arbitrary-length any text.
61    | SivRange     -- ^ __[ - ]__ Character between two characters.
62      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
63
64sivKey :: (O.Textual t) => Char -> t -> Maybe (SivKey, t)
65sivKey '*' t = Just (SivAnyText, t)
66sivKey '_' t = Just (SivAnyChar, t)
67sivKey '-' t = Just (SivRange, t)
68sivKey '.' (O.tCut2 -> O.Jp2 '.' '.' t) = Just (SivAnyText, t)
69sivKey _ _ = Nothing
70
71-- | Convert textual value to sieve token list.
72--
73--  >>> print O.<#!> sivTokens "foo{ba_}[0-9]baz_"
74--  SivText "foo"
75--  SivOpen (SivRepeat 0)
76--  SivText "ba"
77--  SivKey SivAnyChar
78--  SivClose (SivRepeat 0)
79--  SivOpen SivOption
80--  SivText "0"
81--  SivKey SivRange
82--  SivText "9"
83--  SivClose SivOption
84--  SivText "baz_"
85--
86sivTokens :: (O.Textual t) => t -> [SivToken t]
87sivTokens = toks 0
88
89toks :: (O.Textual t) => Int -> t -> [SivToken t]
90toks lv (tBracket -> Just (b, t))  = b : toks (lv + level b) t
91toks lv t | O.tIsEmpty t           = []
92          | otherwise              = text lv t 0 t
93
94text :: (O.Textual t) => Int -> t -> Int -> t -> [SivToken t]
95text lv t0 = loop where
96    loop n (tBracket -> Just (b, t)) = push n $ b : toks (lv + level b) t
97    loop n (O.tCut -> O.Jp c t)
98      | lv == 0       = loop (n + 1) t
99      | Ch.isSpace c  = push n $ toks lv t
100      | otherwise     = case sivKey c t of
101                          Nothing -> loop (n + 1) t
102                          Just (k, t') -> push n $ (SivKey k) : toks lv t'
103    loop n _ = push n []
104
105    push n = case O.tTake n t0 of
106               t | O.tIsEmpty t  -> id
107                 | otherwise     -> (SivText t :)
108
109level :: SivToken t -> Int
110level (SivOpen  _)  =  1
111level (SivClose _)  = -1
112level _             =  0
113
